item.title: US stocks wobble after selloff amid recession concerns
item.description: Markets seesawed between positive and negative territory in early trading on Monday.

item.title: Ukraine bombards Russia with largest drone barrage of war, Moscow says
item.description: Russia's Defense Ministry said its forces shot down 343 Ukrainian drones overnight, in what appeared to be Kyiv's largest ever cross-border aerial att...

item.title: House plans vote on GOP spending bill as Trump lobbies Republican holdouts
item.description: House Republicans are slated to vote Tuesday on their spending bill that would fund the government at current levels through September 2025.

item.title: Garlin Gilchrist announces Democratic bid to become Michigan's first Black governor
item.description: Michigan Lt. Gov. Garlin Gilchrist II is running to become the state's next Democratic governor

item.title: Pope has 'peaceful night' after his prognosis improves and is lifted
item.description: The pope rested peacefully overnight after his prognosis was "lifted" on Monday as he begins his 26th straight day in the hospital, the Vatican said.
